docs.text: Vibrant PyTorch powered Finite Elements Warning: Work in progress. Setup Requirements Python 3.7+ Installation Install it directly into an activated virtual environment: $ pip install vibrant or add it to your Poetry project: $ poetry add vibrant Usage After installation, the package can imported: $ python >>> import vibrant >>> vibrant.__version__

docs.title: Vibrant

docs.text: Install it directly into an activated virtual environment: $ pip install vibrant or add it to your Poetry project: $ poetry add vibrant
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: After installation, the package can imported: $ python >>> import vibrant >>> vibrant.__version__

docs.title: Advanced

docs.text: Contributing Setup To run this project you need poetry. Poetry: https://poetry.eustace.io/docs/#installation Install project dependencies into a virtual environment: poetry install Development Tasks Run the tests: poetry run test Run static analysis: poetry run lint Run formatting tools analysis: poetry run format Build the documentation: poetry run docs To see all available commands, see the pyproject.toml file. Demo Tasks Run the program: poetry run start Release Tasks Release to PyPI: poetry publish
docs.title: Contributing

docs.text: To run this project you need poetry. Poetry: https://poetry.eustace.io/docs/#installation Install project dependencies into a virtual environment: poetry install
